item.title: Running headless Ubuntu Server on Windows 10 with Cygwin, cmder, and Ubik
item.description: How and why I switched from Bash on Ubuntu on Windows to Cygwin and VirtualBox with help from Philip K. Dick. A technical and philosophical post about my approach to Linux tooling on Windows.
